Preparing for VantageScore 4.0: A Guide for Mortgage Lenders With the FHFA, Fannie Mae, and Freddie Mac gearing up to implement VantageScore 4.0 for GSE-funded mortgages, it's crucial for mortgage lenders to prepare. This transition offers significant benefits, but failing to be ready can lead to lost market opportunities and increased regulatory scrutiny. In this blog, we outline for lenders the necessary next steps to prepare for VantageScore 4.0 implementation. Don’t get left behind! Read more here: https://lnkd.in/e4cBcpDd To learn more about VantageScore’s entry into the mortgage market, visit https://lnkd.in/e-a8xK9a ICYMI: This week, VantageScore has shared daily blog posts celebrating our entry into the mortgage industry! Follow us as we walk through credit-scoring in the mortgage industry and how lenders can begin to prepare for the implementation of VantageScore 4.0 credit scores for mortgage. After you read this post, don’t forget to catch up on any others you may have missed.

They are a midsize company that offers the same if not better technology and support than larger companies do. They are licensed in 41 states and have 22 branches. Offering print, email, social, event and swag marketing to help establish and nurture relationships with agents, builders and their loan officers. If you are looking to join a company that truly cares about your needs then this is the right company for you. 3. Peak Residential Lending is a fully delegated Fannie/freddie, FHA, VA, USDA. They are approved in 14 states with more to come. Offering operational excellence with a deal maker mentality-every loan counts. Built by loan originators, who still originate at a high level, with 30+ niche broker options, no overlays on FHA, VA, Conv, USDA, and HECM, up front underwriting streamlines approvals and communication, low manufacturing cost and corporate overhead which means they can offer better pricing and comp. 4.Co/Lab and Dwell Mortgage is a broker that has loan officer opportunities in the following states PA, OH, WV, VA, MD, NC, FL, TX, PR, WA, CA, CO, and UT. They provide a TON of LO support & resources, marketing team & support, inside lead rotation, monthly sales training, newer LO training & mentoring that runs in 6 month cycles, realtor focus marketing and training. They also offer 25 plus lenders, better pricing options and a better comp plan. This client also has franchising opportunities for individuals or branches that want to open their own broker shop. 5. They also offer a closing credit the borrower can use for them service or donate on their behalf to nonprofit organizations dedicated to assisting military personnel and veterans.
